sentences.en: A shaggy style that has lots of chunky layers all over.
sentences.cn: 打了很多厚层次的蓬松发型.

sentences.en: Campus style , fashion, punk, formal, casual, and even shaggy could be seen.
sentences.cn: 校园的 、 潮流的 、 朋克的 、 正式的 、 休闲的, 甚至邋遢的、些许脏乱的.

sentences.en: Do you know why the kids are at my office with Shaggy?
sentences.cn: 为什么孩子们带着长毛来我办公室?

sentences.en: He had thick brown hair and shaggy brows.
sentences.cn: 他一头浓密的棕色头发，眉毛乱糟糟的。

sentences.en: He stared up with a pathetic sharpness of glance from under his shaggy eyebrows.
sentences.cn: 他的眼睛从灰白的粗眉底下往上瞧,眼神悲哀而锐利.

sentences.en: His shaggy grey hair fell loosely across his brow.
sentences.cn: 他凌乱的白发蓬松地搭在额头.

sentences.en: I was 13, sunburned, shaggy - haired, a little aloof, and solitary.
sentences.cn: 我才十三岁, 皮肤黧黑,头发凌乱, 有点儿孤芳自赏, 也不免形单影只.

sentences.en: Milo sniffed in consternation twice, like a shaggy brown hare.
sentences.cn: 迈洛惊愕地倒吸了两口气, 就象一只毛茸茸的棕色野兔一样.

sentences.en: North American hickory having loose gray shaggy bark and edible nuts.
sentences.cn: 北美山胡桃树,有蓬松的灰色的表面粗糙的树皮和可食用的果儿.

sentences.en: The dog has a long and shaggy coat.
sentences.cn: 这条狗长着一身长长的蓬松的毛.

sentences.en: The epicardial surface of the heart shows a shaggy fibrinous exudate.
sentences.cn: 心外膜表面可见粗糙的纤维蛋白渗出物.

sentences.en: This old man shaved his shaggy black beard.
sentences.cn: 这老人剃掉了他浓而粗的胡子.

sentences.en: Three shaggy-haired men thrash tunelessly at their guitars.
sentences.cn: 3个头发蓬乱的男人没腔没调地乱弹着吉他。

words.tran_cn: 有粗毛的；表面粗糙的；精疲力尽的
长成浓密繁茂的样子；毛茸茸；草木丛生
把…的表面弄粗糙；使蓬乱（shag的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: （结局荒诞的或无聊的）冗长瞎扯的故事（或玩笑）

trans.tran_cn: 多粗毛的，票面蓬松的，毛发蓬松的，[动，植]有绒毛的，粗野的，不整洁的
trans.tran_en: shaggy hair or fur is long and untidy
